rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please try again later.
tagAlreadyExists: A tag with that name already exists.
folderAlreadyExists: A folder with that name already exists.
folderCircularReference: Cannot move a folder into its own descendant.
folderNotFound: The specified folder was not found.
notInTrash: Item is not in the trash.
alreadyAMember: Already a member of this organization.
invitationAlreadyUsed: This invitation has already been used.
invitationWrongEmail: This invitation was sent to a different email address.
invitationAlreadySent: An invitation has already been sent to this address.
ownerOnly: Only the owner can perform this action.
cannotChangeHigherRole: Cannot change the role of a member at or above your level.
cannotRemoveHigherRole: Cannot remove a member at or above your level.
keyNotDistributed: Encryption key has not been distributed yet. Please wait for an administrator.
vaultNotReady: Member's vault is not set up yet.
onlyOwnEntries: You can only modify your own entries.
invalidDateRange: The expiry date must be after the issue date.
verifierNotSet: Please lock and unlock your vault first.
accountLocked: Account temporarily locked due to too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
serviceUnavailable: Temporary server error. Please try again.
unknownError: An error occurred. Please try again.
extensionTokenScopeInsufficient: Extension token does not have the required scope.
recoveryKeyNotSet: No Recovery Key has been set up.
